mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, title, seqno, visible, rdate,content,file1,file1saved,thumb1,size1,word) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate, #{content},#{file1},#{file1saved},#{thumb1},#{size1},#{word})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, title, seqno, visible, rdate,content,file1,file1saved,thumb1,size1,word FROM notice ORDER BY seqno ASC
